        <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {
    var users = JSUtil.notNil(current.allocated_members_list) ? current.allocated_members_list.toString().split(',') : [];
    var usersToUpdate;
    if (users.length > 0) {
        usersToUpdate = users;
    } else if (current.getValue('resource_type') == 'user') {
        usersToUpdate = [current.getValue('user_resource')];
    } else if (current.getValue('resource_type') == 'group') {
        var resMgmGrp = new ResourceManagementGroup(current.getValue('group_resource'));
        usersToUpdate = resMgmGrp.getUserIds();
    } else if (current.getValue('resource_type') == 'role') {
        var resMgmRole = new ResourceManagementRole(current.getValue('role'));
        usersToUpdate = resMgmRole.getUserIds();
    }

    var rmAggHelper = new RMAggregateHelper();
    if (usersToUpdate.length > 0) {
		var categories;
		//Non Project Time Aggregates are generated for Resource plan with only planning item field
		if(current.getValue('plan_type') === 'operational_work' || gs.nil(current.getValue('task')))
			categories = ['non_project_time', 'non_project_actual', 'capacity', 'availability'];
		else
			categories = rmAggHelper.allCategories();
        rmAggHelper.updateAggregatesForMultipleUsers(current, usersToUpdate, categories);
    }
})(current, previous);]]></script>
